While I was messing around in there, I saw that Gnome, too - but the Gnome
was accompanied by a Hag (I didn't even get out of the water when I saw
her). The Gnome is a Gnome Spelunker - about a 20th level creature. Don't
know if he drops anything special - we got nothing when he decided to
invade our hunt. No clue what triggers him, either - he just occasionally
seemed to get a bug up his butt and run into the house, attacking PCs. I
wonder if he's any relation to the Gnome in Meldrath's Minotaur Mine?

Talies the Wanderer
